snippet: Pat Marino and his wife, Theresa, would often wake in the middle of the night to go to a nearby diner, just because — but now both are confined to their home.
abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens and food pantries help Pat and Theresa Marino, who have been hit with medical hardships, pay their bills.
lead_paragraph: Pat Marino and his wife, Theresa, would often wake in the middle of the night to go to a nearby diner, just because — but now both are confined to their home.

headline.seo: Couple’s Flair for Spontaneity Is Dimmed by Illness – Neediest Cases
headline.main: A Flair for Spontaneity Is Dimmed by a Painful Disease
